main_subtitle: At the crossroads of nature and progress: your future investment in Cyprus.

log_in.title: Login to your personal account
log_in.subtitle: A new productive journey starts right here

sign_up.subtitle: Create an account and join our community

1.title: Professional management
1.description: Apate Cyprus Estate provides professional project management, which frees investors from the need to be personally involved in the management and monitoring of investments.

2.title: Minimal risks
2.description: The company conducts a thorough analysis and selection of projects, minimizing risks for investors. This allows investors to invest with confidence in a successful outcome.

3.title: Liquidity and flexibility
3.description: Although investing in real estate may be considered a long-term investment, Apate Cyprus Estate offers flexibility in terms of investment timing and returns.

4.title: Sustainable development
4.description: Apate Cyprus Estate is committed to sustainable development, a balanced approach to economic, environmental and social aspects. We build not only for today, but also for future generations.

5.title: Transparency and trust
5.description: We value the trust of our clients and investors. All our activities are based on the principles of transparency and openness. We provide detailed information about our projects, financial performance and company activities.

6.title: Social responsibility
6.description: Apate Cyprus Estate is actively involved in social and charitable initiatives, which demonstrates our responsibility to the community.

partner_program.title: Multi-level referral programme
partner_program.description: Apate Cyprus Estate has developed a multi-level referral programme especially for our clients. Every client of our company can take part in this programme by registering on our online platform and placing at least one own deposit.

tariff_plans.title: Our Plans
tariff_plans.subtitle: At the crossroads of opportunity: investment plans for every goal. Unlock your growth potential with our team of experts

presentation.title: Our exclusive presentation
presentation.subtitle: We reveal the secrets of successful investments, including real estate investments!

roadmap.subtitle: The path to success: our roadmap lays out clear milestones and directions, providing transparency and strategy every step of the way.
roadmap.1: Researching major market trends: rising/falling prices, popular areas for investment, types of properties on trend.
roadmap.2: Establishing strategic partnerships and preparing for first big project with architects, engineers and material suppliers.
roadmap.3: Completion of construction of the first project and its successful commissioning. Attraction of the first investors.
roadmap.4: Starting to develop an idea for the next innovation project. Expanding the team to provide for larger scale tasks.
roadmap.5: Launching construction of a second project with a focus on sustainability and innovation. Expansion of the construction base and use of modern project management methods.
roadmap.6: Continuation of the second project and completion of diversification work. Audit to optimize internal processes.
roadmap.7: Introduction of improved project management methods to ensure efficiency and quality. Launch of an international partner program.
roadmap.8: Completion of construction of the second project and its successful commissioning. Introduction of new technologies and approaches for sustainable growth.

contact_form.title: Start your journey with us
contact_form.subtitle: Any questions? Leave your contacts and we will get back to you.

errors.no_money: You have insufficient funds in your account. Please replenish your balance.

popups.cash_in_popup: We would like to inform you that your payment will be processed manually. We are very grateful that you will take the time to go through the manual payment process. However, you have really helped us by ensuring that your payment is processed correctly, and for that we are grateful. If you have any questions or problems, please email tech support. Thanks again for your contribution to our company!
popups.private_key_popup:
Important: You are about to enter your private financial key. This key is a unique combination of characters that gives you access to your personal financial information.

 Be careful when using your private key. Do not disclose it to third parties, do not save it on public or unsecured devices. If it is lost or stolen, your funds may be at risk. Please make sure you are in a secure and private environment before entering your private key. If you are unsure if your environment is safe, postpone this process until a more appropriate time. Enter your key only if you are absolutely sure of your actions. Remember that it is your responsibility to keep your private key safe.
